尩字的基本解释

尩
wāng
同“尪”。

尩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wāng］
［《廣韻》烏光切，平唐，影。］
亦作“尩1”。亦作“尫1”。亦作“1”。“匡2”的被通假字。
(1)指胸、胫、背等处骨骼的弯曲症。亦指有这种残疾的人。
(2)指孱弱；瘦弱。
(3)引申指弱小。
(4)步态不正。引申指行为邪恶。

尩字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尢字部】　尩； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页298第12
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏光切。同?。【說文】跛曲脛也，本作尣，今作尩。又【禮·檀弓】歲旱，?公召縣子曰：吾欲暴尩而奚若。曰：天則不雨，而暴人之疾，子虐母，乃不可與。【註】尩者，疾病之人，其面向天暴之，冀天之哀其病而雨也。【左傳·僖二十一年】夏大旱，公欲焚巫尩。臧文仲曰：非旱備也，修城郭，貶食省用，務穡勸分。此其務也。巫尩何爲。　又羸弱也。【韓愈文】人固有尩羸而壽考。　又【韻會】或作匡。【荀子·正論篇】傴巫跂匡。讀作尩。亦作㑌。【註】廢疾之人。?與尫同。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
尩
wāng
Same as "尪".
尩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wāng］
["Guangyun" Wuguang cut, Ping Tang, shadow. ]
Also known as "尩1". Also known as "尫1". Also called "1". The false character of "Kuang 2" was passed.
(1) Refers to the curvature of the bones in the chest, shin, back and other places. Also refers to people with this disability.
(2) Refers to weak; thin.
(3) Extended refers to weakness.
(4) Irregular gait. The extension refers to evil behavior.
尩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【You Zi Department】　尩; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 298-12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Wu Guang cut. with?. [Said the text] Lame and crooked shin, this is a 尣, now it is a 尩. Also [Li Tan Gong] Years of drought,? Gongzhao County Zi said: I want to be violent and ridiculous. Said: The sky does not rain, and the violent disease, the child abuses the mother, is not to be involved. [Note] Those who are sick are those who face the violent nature, and those who are mourning the sky are sick and rain. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-One Years] Xia was severely drought, and the public wanted to burn Wugu. Zang Wenzhong said: It’s not a drought to prepare, repair the city, derogate food and save money, and persuade you to divide it. This is also its business. What is Wu Shi.　It's weak and weak. [Han Yuwen] People are inherently 尩羸 and live longevity.　 [Rhyme Club] or as Kuang. 【Xunzi·Structures】Teacher Wushu Kuang. Read as 尩. Also made 㑌. [Note] People who are sick. ? Same as 尫.
